Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.2-19
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.2-19. A patched version of the package is available.
